#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>

#define MAX 500020

using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;

ll tree[MAX],a[MAX],b[MAX];

ll read(int idx)
{
    ll sum=0;
    while(idx>0)
    {
        sum+=tree[idx];
        idx-=(idx&-idx);
    }
    return sum;
}

ll update(int idx,int val)
{
    while(idx<=MAX)
    {
        tree[idx]+=val;
        idx+=(idx&-idx);
    }
}

int main()
{
    int t,n;
    //scanf("%d",&t);
    //while(t--)
    {
        memset(tree,0,sizeof(tree));
        scanf("%d",&n);
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
            b[i]=a[i];
        }

        sort(b,b+n);

        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            int x=int(lower_bound(b,b+n,a[i])-b);
            a[i]=x+1;
        }

        ll invcount=0;

        for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
        {
            ll x=read(a[i]-1);
            invcount+=x;
            update(a[i],1);
        }
        printf("%lld\n",invcount);
    }
    return 0;
}
